boat.name: Verity
boat.full_description: The inboard engine was installed by the manufacturer and was ballasted to suit. In 2021 the boat had a furling headsail replaced with a Furlex 5 capable of being furled and reefed more efficiently. However, as the forestay is part of the standing rigging, withdrawing the bowsprit in harbour is not an option.
boat.construction_details: " part GRP moulding for deck and hull, encapsulated keel, ballasted with concrete and steel punchings.
boat.short_description: 'Verity' is an Oysterman 16 built in 1984, No. 15 in a series of boats built by Riverside Projects in Penryn.

for_sales.sales_text: One of the few remaining Oysterman in good condition. Lying off West Mersea. Sails (main, furling jib and top sail)in good condition. Spars in excellent condition. Hatch renewed in 2018, runners needs replacing. Engine, alternator, bilge pump recently serviced. SSR registered. Inventory available and negotiable. Reasonable offers only.
